Intro:
"Welcome to our series on the fascinating world of Hindu mythology and its impact on Indian spirituality and religion. Join us as we embark on a journey through ancient temples and holy places, uncovering the stories and myths that have shaped the religious beliefs and practices of the Indian people for centuries. From the Ramayana to the Bhagavad Gita, we'll explore the significance of these texts and their relevance in modern times. Get ready to dive deep into the rich spiritual heritage of India and discover the timeless wisdom of Hindu mythology."

Outro:
"We hope you enjoyed our journey through the world of Hindu mythology and its impact on Indian spirituality and religion. Stay tuned for more related videos where we will delve deeper into specific stories and myths, and explore their significance in modern times. From the avatars of god Vishnu to the teachings of Bhagavad Gita. We'll also be exploring the influence of Hindu mythology on Indian art, literature, and pop culture. Don't forget to subscribe to our channel for more engaging and informative videos. Thanks for watching!"

The intro is SEO optimized by including the main topic of the video series and also making it engaging by using words like "journey" and "uncovering" to create a sense of curiosity and interest in the audience. The outro is also engaging by mentioning that there will be more related videos coming soon. It also includes the SEO optimized keywords related to the topic to make it easy for the audience to find similar video content.
